t: Our History & Heritage | Original BTC Lighting – ORIGINAL BTC
s: Original BTC was founded in 1990 by Peter Bowles in Oxfordshire, still our home today. Breaking convention, Peter was the first designer to use bone china in lighting, paving the way for his pioneering investment in British manufacturing. A unique figure in the industry, Peter has launched ...
